name: The Witch's Garden (itch)
description:
Description

A little witch-to-be is seeking the favor of the nature goddess, but in order to earn her powers, she has to prove herself. Follow the witch on her quest to be a stewardess of the Earth. 

Farming 

Build up your own little garden. Plant your crops and watch them grow. Your farmlands have a lot of natural resources to offer, so observe how changes affect your crop yield. 

Explore your Surroundings 

Wander through the natural landscape and discover what your environment has to offer. Be careful though, your actions may have unintended effects on your ecosystem, so explore responsibly. 

Collect and Observe 

Learn about your environment by searching for varieties of flora and fauna. Complete your catalog of knowledge by recording your observations in your encyclopedia.
